name: Leadership and Governance
description: Effective leadership and governance ensure long-term success for your open source project.
author: GitHub
inLanguage: English, Chinese (Traditional)/繁體中文, Chinese (Simplified) / 简体中文, Italian, Turkish/Türkçe, Hungarian/Magyar, Tamil/தமிழ், French/Français, Swahili, Hindi, Russian/Русский, Romanian, Persian/Farsi, Portuguese, Spanish/Español, Greek/Ελληνικά, Polish, German/Deutsch, Nigerian Pidgin, Bengali/Bangla, Dutch, Bulgarian/Български, Malay, Indonesian, Japanese/日本語, Korean/한국어
abstract: This guide outlines effective leadership and governance models for open source projects, emphasizing the importance of transparency, decision-making processes, and creating a structure that supports long-term project sustainability.
accessibilitySummary: These guides are available in over 20 languages, helping global communities learn and lead in open source.
mentions: These guides are available in over 20 languages.
teaches: How to design transparent governance structures, set project policies, and lead open source communities effectively.
